subject: Order #SSN1585
description_text:
Provided tracking number shows no activity. Do you plan on 
shipping soon? Or should I buy peddles from somewhere else?
881851120963 <https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=881851120963>

conversations.body_text: Hi，Aaron Arnold，  感谢您的耐心等待。延迟是由于库存尚未在我们美国仓库上架。我们预计货物将在未来几天内准备好，所以请您再耐心等待一段时间。

Hi Aaron Arnold,  Thank you for your patience. The delay is due to the stock not yet being listed at our U.S. warehouse. We expect the shipment to be ready in the next couple of days, so please bear with us a little longer.
